data.name: iPhone 12
data.description: Welcome to the 64GB iPhone 12 experience in black: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display. 5G technology. A14 Bionic chip, with an intelligence and power never seen before, in addition to being the fastest in a smartphone. Ceramic Shield, four times more resistant to falls. Night mode in each of the cameras. Yes, the iPhone 12 has everything you'd expect from an iPhone, but taken to the extreme.

data.name: Samsung Galaxy A22
data.description: If you need a versatile and functional mobile and at the same time you don't want to give up performance, don't miss the opportunity to get your Samsung Galaxy A22 mobile in black, with 4 GB of RAM and 128 GB of capacity. Quality technology and components at your fingertips.

data.name: Xiaomi Redmi 9
data.description: If you need a versatile and functional mobile at the same time that you do not want to give up performance, do not miss the opportunity to get your Xiaomi Redmi 9 mobile, with 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB of capacity. Quality technology and components at your fingertips.

data.name: OPPO RENO4 Z
data.description: Never miss that perfect shot again. Meet Galaxy S21+ 5G. Designed to revolutionise video and photography with beyond cinematic 8K resolution, so you can snap epic photos right out of video. It has it all: 64MP, our fastest chipset and a massive all-day battery. Things just got epic.

data.name: iPhone 13
data.description: iPhone 13. The most advanced dual camera system on an iPhone. Ultra-fast A15 Bionic chip. A great leap in autonomy. Rugged design. Vertigo 5G networks. And a brighter Super Retina XDR display. And all this with a capacity of 128 GB and in Star White color. What more could you ask for?

data.name: Samsung Galaxy A32
data.description: If you need a versatile and functional mobile at the same time that you do not want to give up performance, do not miss the opportunity to get your Samsung Galaxy A32 mobile in black, with 4 GB of RAM and 128 GB of capacity. Quality technology and components at your fingertips.

data.name: Xiaomi POCO X3
data.description: Xiaomi POCO X3 Pro smartphone in metallic bronze color with 6.67' 120Hz FullHD+ screen, 1080 x 2400 pixels, Android, 4G, Dual SIM, Octa-core CPU up to 2.96GHz, 8GB RAM + 256GB of internal storage, microSD, 48MP quadruple rear camera and 20MP front, 5,160 mAh battery with fast charging (33W) and USB-C connector.

data.name: Oppo Reno4 Z
data.description: The OPPO Reno4 Z rear camera conveys a sense of depth, with a multi-layered look that centers four lenses around a dot of color. This innovative design breaks the rules of everything established, giving you a unique piece of beauty in the palm of your hand.
